    <!-- Right -->
    <div class="contentInsideRight">
        <div class="content"><div class="bannerSection"><div class="bannerLeft"><a><img src="~/media/Images/Product Images/Automotive/AUTO.ashx?h=206&amp;w=478" alt="automotive" width="478" height="206" /></a></div><div class="bannerRight" style="background-color: #010099;"><div class="bannerBoxContent"><div class="eventsSingleLineFormat">Tenaris provides high-quality, tubular components and supplies services that help to streamline the customer’s supply chain.<br /></div></div></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="clear"></div></div></div>

            <!--class=content may have to be updated to work with non-news listing and pub listings-->
            <!--class=content may have to be updated to work with non-news listing and pub listings-->
            <!--class=content may have to be updated to work with non-news listing and pub listings-->

            <!-- Keep this for News and Pub--><div class="content"><!-- Keep this for News and Pub-->
            
		<h3>Certified quality worldwide<br /></h3>
    <p>Tenaris provides a wide range of seamless tubes and tube-based components for car manufacturers and their suppliers. </p>
    <p>The combination of high value-added ISO TS 16949 certified operations, fully-integrated manufacturing processes and its global industrial presence makes Tenaris a strategic supplier for today's demanding automotive market.<br /><br /></p>
    <h3>The tubular alternative</h3>
    <p>Tenaris provides cold-drawn and hot-rolled seamless tubes for application in safety, steering, chassis and suspensions, heavy trucks and trailers, transmission and power train components.</p>
    <p>Tenaris tubular products are used for the manufacturing of <a href="/en/Products/Automotive/AirbagsInflatorsAndComponents.aspx">airbags</a>, <a href="/en/Products/Automotive/Axles.aspx">axles</a>, <a href="/en/Products/Automotive/TransmissionParts.aspx">transmission parts</a> as well as CV joint cages, stabilizers, torsion bars and steering systems, among others.<br /><br /></p>
    <h3>Services</h3>
    <p>Tenaris has three automotive service centers in Argentina, Mexico and Romania<strong> </strong>which help to streamline customers' supply chain management as the Tenaris teams are able to perform high added-value operations according to customer specifications and designs, such as:</p>
    <p>•    Cut-to-length at specified tolerances<br />•    End-finishing, including deburring and bevelling<br />•    Cold and hot forming<br />•    Friction welding<br />•    Hole drilling, punching and reaming.<br /><br /></p>
    <br />
